oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Philip John Schuyler
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A portrait of Philip John Schuyler (1733-1804), standing, in military uniform. A weapon hangs at his side. One hand is behind his back and the other is holding a piece of paper. A chair in the background has his hat and a map is on the table. A saddle sits on the ground next to his boots.
Major General, American Revolution; Member, Continental Congress; New York state senator; U.S. Senator.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Schuyler, Philip John, 1733-1804
English saddles; Saddlery; Stirrups; Military uniforms--History; Military weapons; Hats; Chairs
